item.description: so Monday nights.. kinda boring.. first day back to work from the weekend, what is there to do? Nothing right? WRONG! Let's have a dinner and a movie night every Monday night! =) I am offering my place because I have a big dining room table in the dining room and then after dinner I have a 32 inch flat screen (sony of course) and a dvd player! It will be awesome! so let's do it! =D
item.name: Movie Monday!!
